Metadata.Title: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-10
Metadata.Description: CVE-2024-24786 affecting package kubevirt for versions less than 1.2.0-10. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package kubevirt is earlier than 1.2.0-10, affected by CVE-2024-24786
